title: Postdoc: Optically generated, extremely high-frequency-ultrasound to detect buried micro- and nano-structures
employer: Advanced Research Center for Nanolithography ARCNL
job_description: This two-year postdoc project is at the interface between science and applications and is part of a larger European effort, joined in the ECSEL JU IT2 consortium, which aims to develop 2 nm node te..
employer_description: The Advanced Research Center for Nanolithography is a new type of public-private partnership between the University of Amsterdam, the VU University Amsterdam, the Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research (NWO), and ASML.
